level.heading: Additional penalty for driving under the influence of alcohol or a drug; commercial vehicle.
level.text: A person violating any provision of § 50-2206.12 shall, in addition to any applicable penalty under section § 50-2206.13, be subject to an additional 5 day mandatory-minimum term of incarceration.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-266 added this section.
